title: Ticket #1390: Advertise RESIDENT_SET_SIZE in job ad
description: We would like to make sure that the RESIDENT_SET_SIZE ClassAd attribute is advertised for every job such that it is available via 'condor_q -l'.
remarks:
Default update rates are inconvenient for testing purposes. I had good luck using these: 

MASTER_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 10
UPDATE_INTERVAL = 10
STARTER_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 10
SHADOW_QUEUE_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 10
STARTER_INITIAL_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 10

2010-Jun-14 15:20:29 by rrati:
Patch looks good

2010-Jun-15 16:39:32 by eje:
For VM universe jobs, RSS is reported as zero, which is consistent with current behaviour of related stats ImageSize and ExecutableSize.

If any users want VM universe jobs to report more meaningful job size stats, might be best addressed as a future RFE tkt. Supported flavors of VM (vmware, xen, kvm, etc) would need to be addressed on a case by case basis, unless libvirt could be leveraged.
